articles.title: Delta Variant "Greatest Threat" To US' Covid Efforts: Dr Anthony Fauci - NDTV
articles.description: The highly contagious Delta variant of the coronavirus is the "greatest threat" to America's attempt to eradicate the Covid pandemic, the country's leading infectious disease expert and White House Chief Medical Advisor Dr Anthony Fauci has warned.
articles.content:
Delta variant now makes up over 20% of all new cases in the US, Dr Fauci said (File)
Washington: The highly contagious Delta variant of the coronavirus is the "greatest threat" to America's attempt … [+5104 chars]

articles.title: American Express partners with fintech firms to help customers find mortgages - CNBC
articles.description: American Express has two new fintech partners it's marketing for mortgage-seeking customers.
articles.content:
American Express has two new fintech partnerships it's marketing for customers interested in home loans.
